Package it.azraelsec.Chat

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CDAManager
    The CDAManager class is a Chat Dynamic Address Manager and its task is to dynamically generate and assign multicast IPv4 addresses when the Server needs it.
    ChatMessage
    The ChatMessage class represents a multicast chat message sent from MessageSender or received by MessageReceiver.
    MessageReceiver
    The MessageReceiver class represent a ChatMessage receiver which waits for new messages addressed to him and stores them in a List.
    MessageSender
    The MessageSender class's purposes is to represent an agent which interacts with other MessageReceiver sending messages to them.
